Properties.ProtectedString:
----------------- --| Constants |-- -----------------
local THROWABLE_DAMAGE = 15 local THROWABLE_TIMETOLIVE = 15
local CHANCE_TO_SUMMON = 0.1 local SUMMON_DEBRIS_TIME = 30 local SUMMON_ID = 105428829 local SUMMON_SPAWN_OFFSET = Vector3.new(15, 0, 15) local AI_SCRIPT_NAME = 'TelamonAi'
local COOLDOWN = 1
----------------- --| Variables |-- -----------------
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players')
local InsertService = Game:GetService('InsertService') local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players') local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris')
local Tool = script.Parent local ToolHandle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') --local PewPewSound = script:WaitForChild('PewPew')
local AiScript = script:WaitForChild(AI_SCRIPT_NAME) local CreatorTag = AiScript:WaitForChild('creator')
local MyPlayer = nil local MyCharacter = nil local MyHumanoid = nil local Summon = nil --local BaseLaser = nil
local PlayerConnections = {}
----------------- --| Functions |-- -----------------
-- Returns the closest living Humanoid to position who isn't in excludeList local function FindClosestHumanoid(position, excludeList) -- (Vector3, table) if not position then print("Need a Vector3 position") return nil end
-- Change list values to keys so we can use indexing local excludeSet = {} if excludeList and type(excludeList) == "table" then for _, l in ipairs(excludeList) do excludeSet[l] = true end end
-- Search through Workspace children local closestHumanoid = nil for _, child in pairs(Game.Workspace:GetChildren()) do if (child and child:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and child.Humanoid.Health > 0 and not excludeSet[child.Humanoid]) and (not closestHumanoid or (child.Humanoid.Torso.Position - position).magnitude < (closestHumanoid.Torso.Position - position).magnitude) then closestHumanoid = child.Humanoid end end return closestHumanoid --NOTE: Can be nil end
-- Removes any old creator tags and applies new ones to the specified target local function ApplyTags(target) while target:FindFirstChild('creator') do target.creator:Destroy() end local creatorTag = CreatorTag:Clone() DebrisService:AddItem(creatorTag, 4) creatorTag.Parent = target end
local function OnThrowableReachedTarget(throwable, targetHumanoid) local smackSound = throwable:FindFirstChild('Smack') if smackSound then smackSound:Play() end if targetHumanoid.Health > 0 then ApplyTags(targetHumanoid) targetHumanoid:TakeDamage(THROWABLE_DAMAGE) end throwable:Destroy() end
local function PickNewTarget(throwable) local homing = throwable:FindFirstChild('Homing') if homing then local targetHumanoid = FindClosestHumanoid(throwable.Position, {MyHumanoid, PetHumanoid}) if targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Torso then local targetHead = targetHumanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('Head') homing.Target = targetHead or targetHumanoid.Torso return end -- Otherwise, fall homing:Destroy() end -- Fall to kill plane throwable.CanCollide = false end
-- Change target when the old target disappears local function OnTargetModelChanged(targetModel, property, throwable) if property == 'Parent' and targetModel.Parent == nil then PickNewTarget(throwable) end end
function ThrowLeg(obj) local targetHumanoid = FindClosestHumanoid(ToolHandle.CFrame.p, {MyHumanoid}) if targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Torso then local targetModel = targetHumanoid.Parent local targetHead = targetModel:FindFirstChild('Head') Spawn(function()
local throwable = obj throwable.CFrame = ToolHandle.CFrame+(ToolHandle.CFrame.lookVector*4) throwable.Parent = script.Parent DebrisService:AddItem(throwable, THROWABLE_TIMETOLIVE) throwable:WaitForChild('Throw'):Play() throwable.Name = 'HomingTurkey' local homing = Instance.new('RocketPropulsion') homing.Name = 'Homing' homing.Target = targetHead or targetHumanoid.Torso homing.ReachedTarget:connect(function() OnThrowableReachedTarget(throwable, targetHumanoid) end) targetModel.Changed:connect(function(property) OnTargetModelChanged(targetModel, property, throwable) end) homing.Parent = throwable --DebrisService:AddItem(throwable, THROWABLE_TIMETOLIVE) throwable.Parent = Workspace throwable.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 50, 0) wait(0.5) if throwable then local projectileSwoosh = throwable:FindFirstChild('Swoosh') if projectileSwoosh then projectileSwoosh:Play() end throwable.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 1, 0.5) throwable.CanCollide = true homing:Fire() end
end) end end
function ThrowTurkey(obj)
local targetHumanoid if Summon then targetHumanoid = FindClosestHumanoid(ToolHandle.CFrame.p, {MyHumanoid,Summon:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')}) else targetHumanoid = FindClosestHumanoid(ToolHandle.CFrame.p, {MyHumanoid}) end if targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Torso then local targetModel = targetHumanoid.Parent local targetHead = targetModel:FindFirstChild('Head') Spawn(function()
local throwable = obj throwable.CFrame = ToolHandle.CFrame+(ToolHandle.CFrame.lookVector*4) throwable.Parent = script.Parent
throwable.Name = 'HomingTurkey' local homing = Instance.new('RocketPropulsion') homing.Name = 'Homing' homing.Target = targetHead or targetHumanoid.Torso homing.ReachedTarget:connect(function() homing:Destroy() end) targetModel.Changed:connect(function(property) OnTargetModelChanged(targetModel, property, throwable) end) homing.Parent = throwable
throwable.Parent = Workspace throwable.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 50, 0) wait(0.5)
homing:Fire()
wait(THROWABLE_TIMETOLIVE) if throwable.Parent and not throwable.Parent:IsA('Hat') then throwable.Parent = nil end end) end end
local function OnEquipped() MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyHumanoid = MyCharacter:WaitForChild('Humanoid') MyPlayer = PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(MyCharacter) CreatorTag.Value = MyPlayer
table.insert(PlayerConnections,MyHumanoid.Died:connect(function() MyHumanoid = nil end))
table.insert(PlayerConnections,PlayersService.PlayerRemoving:connect(function(player) if player == MyPlayer then MyHumanoid = nil end end)) end
function MakeTurkey()
local Turkey = Instance.new("Part") Turkey.Anchored = false Turkey.CanCollide = false Turkey.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Turkey.Name = "Turkey" Turkey.Size = Vector3.new(1.2600009441376, 1.5500005483627, 0.99000000953674) Turkey.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Turkey.Locked = false
local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=40311092" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=40311049" Mesh.Parent = Turkey Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh
local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Heat = 25 Fire.Color = Color3.new(1, 0.8156863451004, 0) Fire.Parent = Turkey Fire.size = 2 Fire.Size = 2
local tscript = script:WaitForChild('TurkeyScript'):Clone() tscript.Parent = Turkey tscript.Disabled = false local ntag = CreatorTag:Clone() ntag.Parent = tscript
return Turkey
end
function MakeTurkeyLeg()
local Throwable = Instance.new("Part") Throwable.CanCollide = false Throwable.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Throwable.Color = Color3.new(0.80392163991928, 0.80392163991928, 0.80392163991928) Throwable.Name = "Throwable" Throwable.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Throwable.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.85, 0.85, 0.85) Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=13073626" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=13073598" Mesh.Parent = Throwable Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh
local Throw = Instance.new("Sound") Throw.Pitch = 2 Throw.Parent = Throwable Throw.Name = "Throw" Throw.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=105420672" Throw.Looped = false
local Swoosh = Instance.new("Sound") Swoosh.Pitch = 2 Swoosh.Parent = Throwable Swoosh.Name = "Swoosh" Swoosh.Volume = 0.20000000298023 Swoosh.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/Rocket whoosh 01.wav" Swoosh.Looped = true
local Smack = Instance.new("Sound") Smack.Parent = Throwable Smack.Name = "Smack" Smack.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=105424180" Smack.Looped = false
return Throwable
end
local function OnActivated() if Tool.Enabled and MyHumanoid.Health > 0 then Tool.Enabled = false
-- Chance to summon if (not Summon or Summon.Parent == nil) and math.random() <= CHANCE_TO_SUMMON then ---[[ Summon = InsertService:LoadAsset(SUMMON_ID):GetChildren()[1] --NOTE: Cloning causes health problems if Summon then local aiScriptClone = AiScript:Clone() aiScriptClone.Parent = Summon aiScriptClone.Disabled = false DebrisService:AddItem(Summon, SUMMON_DEBRIS_TIME) Summon.Parent = Workspace Summon:MoveTo(ToolHandle.Position + SUMMON_SPAWN_OFFSET) end --]] elseif math.random()<=.5 then ThrowLeg(MakeTurkeyLeg()) else ThrowTurkey(MakeTurkey()) end
-- Pew pew local targetPoint = MyHumanoid.TargetPoint
wait(COOLDOWN) Tool.Enabled = true end end
local function OnUnequipped() if Summon then Summon:Destroy() Summon = nil end for _,i in pairs(PlayerConnections) do i:disconnect() end
PlayerConnections = {}
end
-------------------- --| Script Logic |-- --------------------
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

----------------- --| Constants |-- -----------------
local THROWABLE_DAMAGE = 15 local THROWABLE_CHANCE = 0.05 local THROWABLE_TIMETOLIVE = 15
local ONE_STEP = 1 / 30
-------------------- --| WaitForChild |-- --------------------
-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
----------------- --| Variables |-- -----------------
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players')
local ThrowSound = WaitForChild(script, 'Throw') local SwooshSound = WaitForChild(script, 'Swoosh') local SmackSound = WaitForChild(script, 'Smack')
local Pet = script.Parent local PetHumanoid = WaitForChild(Pet, 'Humanoid') local Throwable = WaitForChild(Pet, 'Throwable')
local CreatorTag = WaitForChild(script, 'creator')
local MyPlayer = CreatorTag.Value local MyModel = MyPlayer.Character local MyHumanoid = MyModel.Humanoid
local LastThrowTime = 0
----------------- --| Functions |-- -----------------
-- Returns the closest living Humanoid to position who isn't in excludeList local function FindClosestHumanoid(position, excludeList) -- (Vector3, table) if not position then print("Need a Vector3 position") return nil end
-- Change list values to keys so we can use indexing local excludeSet = {} if excludeList and type(excludeList) == "table" then for _, l in ipairs(excludeList) do excludeSet[l] = true end end
-- Search through Workspace children local closestHumanoid = nil for _, child in pairs(Game.Workspace:GetChildren()) do if (child and child:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and child.Humanoid.Health > 0 and not excludeSet[child.Humanoid]) and (not closestHumanoid or (child.Humanoid.Torso.Position - position).magnitude < (closestHumanoid.Torso.Position - position).magnitude) then closestHumanoid = child.Humanoid end end return closestHumanoid --NOTE: Can be nil end
-- Removes any old creator tags and applies new ones to the specified target local function ApplyTags(target) while target:FindFirstChild('creator') do target.creator:Destroy() end local creatorTag = CreatorTag:Clone() DebrisService:AddItem(creatorTag, 4) creatorTag.Parent = target end
local function OnThrowableReachedTarget(throwable, targetHumanoid) local smackSound = throwable:FindFirstChild('Smack') if smackSound then smackSound:Play() end if targetHumanoid.Health > 0 then ApplyTags(targetHumanoid) targetHumanoid:TakeDamage(THROWABLE_DAMAGE) end throwable:Destroy() end
local function PickNewTarget(throwable) local homing = throwable:FindFirstChild('Homing') if homing then local targetHumanoid = FindClosestHumanoid(throwable.Position, {MyHumanoid, PetHumanoid}) if targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Torso then local targetHead = targetHumanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('Head') homing.Target = targetHead or targetHumanoid.Torso return end -- Otherwise, fall homing:Destroy() end -- Fall to kill plane throwable.CanCollide = false end
-- Change target when the old target disappears local function OnTargetModelChanged(targetModel, property, throwable) if property == 'Parent' and targetModel.Parent == nil then PickNewTarget(throwable) end end
-------------------- --| Script Logic |-- --------------------
ThrowSound.Parent = Throwable --NOTE: To be played from hand SwooshSound.Parent = Throwable --NOTE: To be played from projectile SmackSound.Parent = Throwable --NOTE: To be played from projectile on hit
PetHumanoid.Health = PetHumanoid.MaxHealth -- This never works Delay(1, function() PetHumanoid.Health = PetHumanoid.Health + 1 end) -- So at least trigger healing
MyHumanoid.Died:connect(function() MyHumanoid = nil end)
PlayersService.PlayerRemoving:connect(function(player) if player == MyPlayer then MyHumanoid = nil end end)
while PetHumanoid and MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid.Health > 0 do local torso = MyHumanoid.Torso PetHumanoid:MoveTo(torso.Position + Vector3.new(-4, 0, -4), torso)
local now = tick() if now - LastThrowTime > 0.5 and math.random() <= THROWABLE_CHANCE then --print("Throw") LastThrowTime = now local targetHumanoid = FindClosestHumanoid(torso.Position, {MyHumanoid, PetHumanoid}) if targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Torso then local targetModel = targetHumanoid.Parent local targetHead = targetModel:FindFirstChild('Head') Spawn(function() ThrowSound:Play() local throwable = Throwable:Clone() throwable.Name = 'HomingTurkey' local homing = Instance.new('RocketPropulsion') homing.Name = 'Homing' homing.Target = targetHead or targetHumanoid.Torso homing.ReachedTarget:connect(function() OnThrowableReachedTarget(throwable, targetHumanoid) end) targetModel.Changed:connect(function(property) OnTargetModelChanged(targetModel, property, throwable) end) homing.Parent = throwable DebrisService:AddItem(throwable, THROWABLE_TIMETOLIVE) throwable.Parent = Workspace throwable.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 100, 0) wait(0.5) if throwable then local projectileSwoosh = throwable:FindFirstChild('Swoosh') if projectileSwoosh then projectileSwoosh:Play() end throwable.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 1, 0.5) throwable.CanCollide = true homing:Fire() end end) end end wait(ONE_STEP) end
DebrisService:AddItem(Pet, 0)

local Damage = 5
local HatAwarded = false
function onTouched(hit) if (hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") ~= nil and not HatAwarded) and game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)~=script:WaitForChild('creator').Value then HatAwarded = true for _,i in pairs(hit.Parent:GetChildren()) do if i:IsA('Hat') then i:Destroy() end end
local h = Instance.new("Hat") local p = script.Parent h.Name = "Hat" p.Parent = h p.Name = "Handle" p.formFactor = 0 p.Size = Vector3.new(-0,-0,-1) p.BottomSurface = 0 p.TopSurface = 0 p.Locked = true script.Parent.Mesh:clone().Parent = p h.Parent = hit.Parent h.AttachmentPos = Vector3.new(0,-0.6,0)
while h.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') do h.Parent.Humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) wait(.5) end h:Destroy() end end
script.Parent.Touched:connect(onTouched)

local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
